name: Lone Star State of Mind

summary_text: 6 time Award winning romantic comedy about two young men, from mixed backgrounds, falling love ...and their clashes with their overbearing mothers.

summary_text: The final sixty-seven days of Van Gogh's life are examined.

summary_text: Manager of female dance group and his cousin leads the group on a tour in the Rome and prohibit them to socialize with men. Problems occur when we see that one of the girls has a baby in Rome.

summary_text: The lives of the residents of a small French town are changed when thousands of the recently dead inexplicably come back to life and try to integrate themselves into society that has changed for them.

name: Lucky 7
summary_text: Instead of really living her life, since losing her mother at age seven, Seattle lawyer Amy Myer sticks to a ridiculously detailed time-line mother drew as a guideline in all walks of life, even love in search of marriage with 'number 7'.

name: Bad Company
summary_text: Nelson Crowe is a CIA operative under the thumb of the Company for a disputed delivery of $50,000 in gold. They blackmail him into working for the Grimes Organization, which is set up as a ...                See full summary »

name: The Stratton Story
summary_text: Star major league pitcher Monty Stratton loses a leg in a hunting accident, but becomes determined to leave the game on his own terms.

name: Omerta
summary_text: A recounting of the story of infamous British-born terrorist Ahmed Omar Saeed Sheikh, who kidnapped and murdered Wall Street Journal reporter Daniel Pearl in 2002.

name: Futuresport
summary_text: In 2025, Futuresport is the organized sport of the planet. But someone else is getting organized and their game is war.

name: Dead Rising: Endgame
summary_text: In a zombie-infested quarantined zone of East Mission City, investigative reporter Chase Carter must stop a secret government conspiracy.

name: Only
summary_text: After a comet releases a mysterious virus that begins to kill all the women in the world, a young couple hides out in their over-sterilized apartment trying to fight for their lives.

name: The Cat and the Canary
summary_text: When an eccentric family meets in their uncle's remote, decaying mansion on the tenth anniversary of his death for the reading of his will, murder and madness follow.

name: The Dawn Patrol
summary_text: British flying aces in World War I contend with the harsh realities of war.

name: One Dark Night
summary_text: As part of an initiation into a club called the Sisters, a young girl must spend the night in a mausoleum.

name: Red-Headed Woman
summary_text: Lillian relentlessly attempts to seduce a married man.

name: Bhuddah Hoga Tera Baap
summary_text: A quick-tempered, flamboyantly-dressed, retired hit-man returns to India for one last job. Just don't call him "Buddah"

name: Antares
summary_text: Three stories revolve around the love lives of an adulterous woman, a checkout girl and a single mother.

name: Fanfan
summary_text: A hang-up man tries to love in a different way from normal, and finally manages the psychological shadow for love.

name: Hickok
summary_text: Legendary lawman and gunslinger, Wild Bill Hickok, is tasked with taming the wildest cow-town in the west. While delivering his own brand of frontier justice, the infamous gunfighter's reputation as the fastest draw in the west is put to the test.

name: Blood Machines
summary_text: An artificial intelligence escapes her spaceship to turn into a female ghost and challenges two blade runners to a galactic chase.

name: Povodyr
summary_text: American boy Peter and blind minstrel Ivan are thrown together by fate amidst the turbulent mid-1930s Soviet Ukraine.

name: Eight Miles High
summary_text: Akiz's movie focuses on the restless life of Uschi Obermaier, the icon of the 1968 movement in Germany and groupie. At the age of 16, Uschi is bored by her job in a photo lab, but soon ...                See full summary »

name: 10 Minutes Gone
summary_text: A crime thriller that centers on a man whose memory has been lost due to a bank heist gone wrong. The character will need to piece together the missing 10 minutes from his memory in order to determine who sabotaged him.

name: Caterina in the Big City
summary_text: Caterina, forced to leave her small town at the age of thirteen, faces the complications of living in the big metropoly of Rome.

name: Ripper
summary_text: A massacre survivor (A.J. Cook) studies serial killers under a famous expert (Bruce Payne), but her classmates soon start dying at the hands of a Jack the Ripper copycat.

name: Malone
summary_text: An ex-C.I.A. hit man running from his past (Malone) finds just how difficult it is to retire when he runs across a small town controlled by mercenaries and a family that's resisting their control.

name: Phobia
summary_text: An agoraphobic young woman, traumatized by past events, finds herself trapped and terrorized in her own home.

name: Slice
summary_text: When a pizza delivery driver is murdered on the job, the city searches for someone to blame: Ghosts? Drug dealers? A disgraced werewolf?

name: Nousukausi
summary_text: Katri and Janne want to make a trip, which none of their friends have made. They end up in Jakomäki.

name: By Dawn's Early Light
summary_text: A non-NATO nuclear missile is fired from Turkey at USSR, where it detonates. Soviet response is automatic as it's seen as a NATO missile. Can continued escalation be avoided? We follow the US president and a bomber crew.

name: Golgo 13: The Professional
summary_text: After killing the son of a powerful oil tycoon, an infamous hit-man becomes the target of American soldiers and superhuman killers.

name: Johnny Eager
summary_text: The step-daughter of a district attorney falls in love with a gangster on parole who her father originally imprisoned.

name: Oh, Hello on Broadway
summary_text: Two delusional geriatrics reveal curious pasts, share a love of tuna and welcome a surprise guest in this filming of the popular comedy show.

name: U Want Me 2 Kill Him?
summary_text: A teenage boy's descent into the dangerous world of the Internet and the harrowing consequences of his actions. A true story.

name: Even Angels Eat Beans
summary_text: Striving for a higher standard of living, a former ice-cream man and a wrestler convince a well-known mobster to hire them. However, they both soon realize that criminal life is not what they were looking for.

name: Sommer vorm Balkon
summary_text: A tragicomic movie which focuses on two women and their daily struggle for survival during a summer in Berlin. Katrin, a jobless single mom, and Nike, a nurse, live in the same house and ...                See full summary »

name: Back to the Beach
summary_text: Frankie and Annette, having grown up and put aside their beach-partying lifestyle, visit their daughter in Southern California and discover there's still some wild times left in them.

name: The Maltese Falcon
summary_text: A lovely dame with dangerous lies employs the services of a private detective, who is quickly caught up in the mystery and intrigue of a statuette known as the Maltese Falcon.

name: Cuck
summary_text: When a frustrated loner gains popularity as an Alt-Right vlogger, the online echo chamber turns his fears into a deadly rage.

name: The Intruders
summary_text: After the traumatic loss of her mother, a teenaged girl tries to uncover the dark secrets behind her new home, in spite of her father's disbelief.

name: Vengo
summary_text: Caco is a proud, handsome man, head of a family, and very powerful in the local community. Yet he has been torn to pieces by the death of his beloved daughter. He constantly visits her ...                See full summary »

name: Nicholas on Holiday
summary_text: The summer holidays begin, Nicolas and his family travel to the seaside where a whole new series of adventures await them.

name: The Depraved
summary_text: When a group of urban explorers venture beneath Berlin, their guide hurts himself and the group must struggle to escape the subterranean maze beneath the city.

name: Colonel Redl
summary_text: Set during the fading glory of the Austro-Hungarian empire, the film tells of the rise and fall of Alfred Redl (Brandauer), an ambitious young officer who proceeds up the ladder to become ...                See full summary »

name: Scorched Earth
summary_text: A bounty hunter named Attica Gage tracks down criminals in a post-apocalyptic Earth.

name: Hum
summary_text: A dockworker overthrows the tyranny of a cruel gangster but has to run away to make a new life for himself and his brothers. Fifteen years later, his past catches up with him as his old enemy resurfaces.

name: The Cat and the Canary
summary_text: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.

name: The Summer of Sangaile
summary_text: 17 years old Sangaile is fascinated by stunt planes. She meets a girl her age at a summer aeronautical show. Sangaile allows Auste to discover her most intimate secret and in the process finds the only person that truly encourages her to fly.

name: Dirch
summary_text: A biography of the Danish actor and comedian, Dirch Passer.

name: Gekijô ban Bleach: The DiamondDust Rebellion - Mô hitotsu no hyôrinmaru
summary_text: An artifact known as the "King's Seal" is stolen during transport from the Soul Society by an unidentified Soul Reaper and two Arrancar resembling girls who control fire and lightning. ...                See full summary »

name: Aaltra
summary_text: In this pitch black comedy the rivalry between two neighbors escalates into an all out war. Through a maintenance error on a tractor they both end up, paralyzed, in a wheelchair. It seems ...                See full summary »

name: Style Wars
summary_text: A documentary that exposes the rich growing subculture of hip-hop that was developing in New York City in the late '70s and early '80s, specifically focusing on graffiti art and breakdancing.

name: The Binge
summary_text: Set in a time where all drugs and alcohol are illegal, the only day anyone can participate in the "fun" is on Binge day.

name: Micki + Maude
summary_text: A bigamist must keep his wives from meeting each other, which becomes tricky when they're both pregnant.

name: Resurrection
summary_text: A woman enters the afterlife briefly after a car crash that kills her husband. But she survives - and finds herself possessing strange powers.

name: Needle
summary_text: A killer uses an 18th century machine with supernatural powers to terrorize students at a college.

name: The Brink's Job
summary_text: A fictional retelling of the infamous Brink's Company robbery in Boston, which took place on January 17th, 1950, with a score of $2.700.000, and cost the American taxpayers $29.000.000 to apprehend the culprits with only $58.000 recovered.

name: Up!
summary_text: This kicks off with the murder of one Adolf Schwartz (who bears a striking resemblance to another famous Adolf) by placing a ravenous piranha fish in his bathtub. Who did it? No-one knows ...                See full summary »

name: Coffin 2
summary_text: Trick is among five hostages trapped together, paralyzed from the neck down. While an FBI agent and former detective race against the clock to find their location, the group tries to figure a way out before their promised execution.

name: Gerzek Saban
summary_text: People mistake a naive extra for his lookalike gangster and cause funny events.

name: The Trench
summary_text: A story about a group of soldiers' last days before the battle of the Somme in 1916.

name: Mame
summary_text: Following the death of his father, an orphan is sent to live with his free-spirited aunt.

name: The Cleaning Lady
summary_text: As a means to distract herself from an affair, a love-addicted woman befriends a cleaning lady, badly scarred by burns. She soon learns, these scars run much deeper than the surface.

name: Love Never Dies
summary_text: 10 years has passed since a fire broke out in Paris, leaving only a mask behind - As the love story continues in Coney Island, NY, The Phantom's undying love has grown for the soprano ...                See full summary »

name: The Fluffer
summary_text: A young man employed as a fluffer in the adult entertainment industry finds himself falling for a gay-for-pay porn star whose hedonistic lifestyle may lead them both to destruction.

name: Sooryavansham
summary_text: Heera fails to live up to expectations of his father Thakur Bhanupratap Singh, a powerful and respected man of his community. Despite all odds Heera struggles to keep his father's pride.

name: Molly
summary_text: A bachelor becomes the unwilling guardian of his autistic, intellectually disabled sister; then an experimental treatment works a dramatic change in her brain and his attitude.

name: Bade Miyan Chote Miyan
summary_text: Arjun and Pyare Mohan are honest policemen who work together. Trouble follows when thieves Bade Miyan and Chote Miyan, look-alikes of Arjun and Pyare, commit crimes and the hapless duo are blamed for it.

name: Love Crazy
summary_text: A wife suspecting infidelity starts divorce proceedings, so the husband pretends to be insane in order to delay the divorce and clear up the misunderstanding.

name: Arundhati
summary_text: A brave queen battles an evil mystic. Three generations later, he comes back to haunt the queen's descendants.

name: I-See-You.com
summary_text: A 17-year-old boy buys mini-cameras and displays the footage online at I-see-you.com. The cash rolls in as the site becomes a major hit. Everyone seems to have fun until it all comes crashing down....

name: Sex Is Comedy
summary_text: A director struggles to film a difficult, intimate sex scene between two actors who happen to hate each other.

name: Khamoshi: The Musical
summary_text: The daughter of deaf-mute parents seeks their understanding when she discovers a love for music.

name: Carry On Cowboy
summary_text: Stodge City is in the grip of the Rumpo Kid and his gang. Mistaken identity again takes a hand as a "sanitary engineer" (plumber) by the name of Marshal P. Knutt is mistaken for a law marshal! Being the conscientious sort, Marshal tries to help the town get rid of Rumpo, and a showdown is inevitable. Marshal has two aids - revenge-seeking Annie Oakley and his sanitary expertise...

name: Tarzan's Secret Treasure
summary_text: Tarzan's jungle home, and his family, Jane and Boy, are threatened by men greedy for gold.

name: Night Creatures
summary_text: In 18th-century England, the Royal Crown sends Royal Navy Captain Collier and his crew to investigate reports of illegal smuggling and bootlegging in a coastal town where locals believe in Marsh Phantoms.

name: Cowboy
summary_text: An idealistic tenderfoot Chicago hotel clerk is taken on a cattle-drive to Mexico by famous trail boss Tom Reece but discovers that cowboy life isn't what he expected.

name: Baba Parasi
summary_text: A group of siblings that share nothing but a father come together after the patriarch's death to compete for his fortune. He left a save for his children, but took the password to the grave with him.

name: Deadly Prey
summary_text: A group of sadistic mercenaries kidnap people off the streets and set them loose on the grounds of their secret camp, so the "students" at the camp can learn how to track down and kill their prey.

name: Fleuve noir
summary_text: The disappearance of a boy sends an alcoholic cop on the track of a suspicious teacher while falling for the grieving mother.

name: Harvest Moon
summary_text: After her family goes bankrupt, a city woman (Jessy Schram) travels to the country to fix up a struggling pumpkin farm that her father (Willie Aames) bought as an investment.

name: All of My Heart
summary_text: After inheriting half of a house, a young woman develops an unexpected friendship with her co-owner.

name: Gurbetçi Saban
summary_text: A man goes to Germany to work there and falls for a Turkish girl who like him came to work in Germany too.

name: The Day of the Dolphin
summary_text: A marine biologist teaches his dolphins to communicate in English but shady characters plan to kidnap the trained mammals for a more sinister purpose.

name: Bizans oyunlari: Geym of Bizans
summary_text: After the death of Byzantium King III. Kilitor, difficult days start for the Mayalar. The new Queen V. Kilitorya attack to Mayalar and kidnap their women to break their DNA code.

name: Between Your Legs
summary_text: Javier's life gets complicated when a something unexpected turns up in his car's trunk.
